----------------------------------------
ABOUT THIS FOLDER
----------------------------------------

This folder contains native libraries needed by KakaduNativeProcessor.
If you aren't using KakaduNativeProcessor, it can be safely ignored.
Otherwise, see the Cantaloupe user manual -> Processors section ->
KakaduNativeProcessor section for an explanation of what to do with
this stuff.

Note that the Kakadu libraries contained in subfolders were compiled
using a Kakadu Public Service license and may not be used for commercial
purposes. See the following document for detailed terms:
http://kakadusoftware.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/Kakadu-Licence-Terms-Feb-2018.pdf
